title: Which superheroes are arguably autistic? - Quora

response.answer_text: Reed “Mr. Fantastic” Richards and Black Manta (from the pre- New-52 era) are both diagnosed as on the spectrum in their respective comic canon.Rorschach is certainly possible, although separating it from his clear PTSD is a neigh impossible task.Super intelligent characters, especially robots and aliens tend to be portrayed with autistic traits: Dr. Manhattan (he doesn’t quite seem to be a pure psychopath), Martian Manhunter (possibly), Vision, Spock, etc.If you can count the Power Rangers, Billy Cranston (Blue Ranger), is canonically autistic as well.While Legion is described at points as autistic, his primary presentation is DID (dissociative personality disorder) and David, the core personality is not autistic.

Rorschach from Watchmen was very clearly autistic, as was the role model upon which he was based Mr. A. The black and white thinking, failure to take into account other peoples circumstances and inability to deal with change make this very clear.
